Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a range of features that we believe will significantly enhance your experience. Considering its quality and functionality, I propose a price of $150 for it. This is a special offer considering its value, and I'm confident it will be beneficial for you. If you have any questions or need more information, feel free to ask. Looking forward to your response! 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $150. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $150
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
